title: 55 Of My Favorite Seafood Recipes For Lent!
description: 30 incredible seafood recipes that are perfect for the lenten season. These lent recipes include salmon, shrimp, fish sandwiches, tacos, pizza, chowder, grits and more! Today I’m sharing a bunch of my favorite seafood recipes for lent! I’ve compiled some of my favorite seafood dishes here for those of you who observe the lenten season. […] The post 55 Of My Favorite Seafood Recipes For Lent! appeared first on How Sweet Eats.
author: Jessica
excerpt: 30 incredible seafood recipes that are perfect for the lenten season. These lent recipes include salmon, shrimp, fish sandwiches, tacos, pizza, chowder, grits and more!
text: 30 incredible seafood recipes that are perfect for the lenten season. These lent recipes include salmon, shrimp, fish sandwiches, tacos, pizza, chowder, grits and more! Today I’m sharing a bunch of my favorite seafood recipes for lent! I’ve compiled some of my favorite seafood dishes here for those of you who observe the lenten season. While these days, I almost always will opt for a meatless meal itself over fish specifically, I have to say that man oh man and I looking forward to a great fish sandwich this weekend. We hit up many local places that have incredible fish frys and it’s a highlight of the season. In case you are cooking at home on Fridays, here are a ton of my favorites – the best of the best. This list is fairly salmon and shrimp heavy because those are the most frequent forms of seafood that we eat. However, many of the dishes can also be prepared with a white fish like cod or even halibut. Love them all! And if you’d simply prefer a meatless dish, here are some of my favorites. 45 Lent Recipes Smoky Sweet Cedar Plank Salmon with Sesame Asparagus Blackened Shrimp Kale Caesar Salad Herb Brown Butter Scallops with Champagne Risotto Beer Battered Air Fryer Fish Grilled Fish Tacos Grilled Shrimp Couscous Bowls Sticky Salmon with Avocado Greens Lemon Garlic Fish and Orzo Packets Roasted Salmon Salad html:
30 incredible seafood recipes that are perfect for the lenten season. These lent recipes include salmon, shrimp, fish sandwiches, tacos, pizza, chowder, grits and more!

Today I’m sharing a bunch of my favorite seafood recipes for lent!

I’ve compiled some of my favorite seafood dishes here for those of you who observe the lenten season.

While these days, I almost always will opt for a meatless meal itself over fish specifically, I have to say that man oh man and I looking forward to a great fish sandwich this weekend. We hit up many local places that have incredible fish frys and it’s a highlight of the season.

In case you are cooking at home on Fridays, here are a ton of my favorites – the best of the best.

This list is fairly salmon and shrimp heavy because those are the most frequent forms of seafood that we eat. However, many of the dishes can also be prepared with a white fish like cod or even halibut. Love them all!

And if you’d simply prefer a meatless dish, here are some of my favorites.

45 Lent Recipes

Smoky Sweet Cedar Plank Salmon with Sesame Asparagus

Blackened Shrimp Kale Caesar Salad

Herb Brown Butter Scallops with Champagne Risotto

Beer Battered Air Fryer Fish

Grilled Fish Tacos

Grilled Shrimp Couscous Bowls

Bang bang salmon bowls

Salmon & couscous parchment packets

Blackened fish sandwiches with avocado tartar sauce
